items.title: Campus café adds reusable cup discount
items.summary: A discount is available for customers who bring reusable cups to campus cafés.

items.title: Library extends weekend study hours
items.summary: Weekend opening hours have been extended to support students during midterm season.

items.title: Transit route detours announced for maintenance
items.summary: Several routes will follow temporary detours due to scheduled road maintenance.

items.title: Student club fair opens registration
items.summary: Clubs can register to host a booth at the upcoming campus club fair.

items.title: Cold weather advisory issued for morning commute
items.summary: Temperatures are expected to drop significantly overnight; commuters should dress warmly.

items.title: New quiet study zone opens on third floor
items.summary: A new quiet study zone with reservable desks is available starting this week.

items.title: Beginner-friendly hack night announced
items.summary: A local meetup is hosting a guided hack night for beginners with volunteer mentors.

items.title: Campus fitness center offers new drop-in class schedule
items.summary: Drop-in classes have been updated with new times and additional beginner sessions.

items.title: Community market returns for winter season
items.summary: Vendors will offer produce, crafts, and baked goods at the weekend community market.

items.title: Workshop: writing clear commit messages
items.summary: A short workshop will cover practical tips for readable commits and clean git history.

items.title: Short-term parking changes near main entrance
items.summary: Several short-term parking stalls will be temporarily unavailable due to construction.

items.title: Food pantry donation drive begins
items.summary: A donation drive is collecting non-perishable items to support the campus food pantry.

items.title: Freezing rain warning for tonight
items.summary: Road conditions may become slippery; allow extra travel time and use caution.

items.title: Career services adds resume review appointments
items.summary: New appointment slots are available for resume reviews and interview preparation.

items.title: Public lecture: practical cybersecurity basics
items.summary: A public lecture will cover password hygiene, phishing awareness, and safe browsing habits.

items.title: City announces snow clearing priority updates
items.summary: Snow clearing priorities have been updated for major roads, bus routes, and school zones.

items.title: Study group sign-ups open for core courses
items.summary: Students can join peer study groups matched by course and availability.

items.title: Workshop: writing an OpenAPI spec
items.summary: A guided session will demonstrate how to document REST endpoints with OpenAPI.

items.title: Campus shuttle schedule updated
items.summary: Shuttle frequencies have been adjusted during peak hours to reduce wait times.

items.title: Community volunteer day registration opens
items.summary: Registration is now open for a community volunteer day with multiple project options.
